AgriVineyardBlock.description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a vineyard block (uniform zone of the vineyard).

agroVocConcept.description: Reference to the agrovoc term associated with this item

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this item

dataProvider.description: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

dateCreated.description: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

dateModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

isOrganic.description: True if vineyard zone is treated with organic products only, otherwise false

name.description: The name of this vineyard block.

address.description: The physical address of this block or nearest building to this block

descriptiveRegion.description: Descriptive region of this vineyard block

descriptiveVillage.description: Descriptive village of this vineyard block

alignment.description: direction of vineyard block’s rows if vineyard block is planted in rows

owner.description: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

items.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

relatedSource.description: List of IDs the current entity may have in external applications

application.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

seeAlso.description: list of uri pointing to additional resources about the item

source.description: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

type.description: NGSI Entity Type: It has to be AgriVineyardBlock
